awe6.interfaces.ISceneTransition

type
interface
implements
IViewable
IProgress
IProcess
The ISceneTransition interface should be implemented by objects intended to display visual transitions during scene changes.

Instance Methods

getDuration( ?asTime : Bool ) : Float

parameters
?asTime If true returns duration in milliseconds, else updates.
returns
The time over which the transition occurs.
The time over which the transition occurs.
